short_summary: Construction of Caribou Conservation Breeding Facility in Jasper National Park.
description: The construction of a caribou breeding facility in Jasper National Park (JNP) in a potential location south of the Jasper town site off of Highway 93A. The facility will be constructed on a previously undisturbed parcel of forested land.
full_summary:
================

### Government Tender Announcement: Phase 1 ITQ-5P423-220141

**Title**  
Phase 1 - ITQ - 5P423-220141 - Parks Canada Agency - Caribou Conservation Breeding Facility

**Reference**  
WS3619297283-Doc3619343113

### Project Overview

Parks Canada Agency invites qualified contractors to participate in the **Caribou Conservation Breeding Facility** construction project in Jasper National Park. This initiative aims to construct a new facility on an undisturbed forested land parcel, contingent upon public consultation, environmental assessments, and engagement with Indigenous partners.

### Key Project Details

*   **Expected Contract Duration**: 30 months
*   **Contract Start Date**: November 30, 2022
*   **Contract End Date**: August 31, 2025
*   **Designations of the Facility**: Caribou Conservation Breeding Facility

**Tendering Process**  
The solicitation process comprises two phases:

1.  **Phase One (Qualifications Based Evaluation)**: This phase assesses the qualifications of all interested suppliers.
2.  **Phase Two (Financial Bids)**: Qualified suppliers will be invited to provide a financial bid based on the specifications and drawings.

**Submission Guidelines**

*   All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by September 21, 2022, at 2:00 PM CDT.
*   Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

To receive additional information and application requirements, please contact:

*   **Guilford, Alison (SPAC/PSPC)**  
    Email: <alison.guilford@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   **SAP Ariba Discovery Link**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13894515?extsite=MTM4OTQ1MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Related Information
*   **Trade Agreements**: This tender is linked to the following trade agreements:
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada–United States–Mexico Agreement (CUSMA)
    *   Canada–Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada–European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada–Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada–South Korea Free Trade Agreement
